files.README.md:
# Lean 4 Claude Code Plugin

LSP support for Lean 4 via `lake serve`.

## Install

```bash
/plugin marketplace add alok/lean4-claude-plugin
/plugin install lean4@lean4-tools
```

## Prerequisites

```bash
curl https://elan.lean-lang.org -sSf | sh
```

## License

MIT
